txt.en: Natsatúg perishes as did Thrúgord: with his smiling fangs bared
'Have you seen a raiding-party of Orcs?'
'The raiding-party is defeated?'
'That is not the one we seek now.'
'They did wound one of their own and leave him behind, so perhaps not!'
'[placeholder], go help Imák and Glóin! I will find some water to douse this flame!'
The raiding-party from Gundabad had designs upon the peaceful Beorning village of Limlók... but where has it gone?
The wooden palisade appears sturdy enough at this location
The posts of the encircling wall are lower here
'What brings you to Limlók, strangers?'
'We have enough dwarves here.'
'I have.'
'My people killed them to the last Orc, as we always do.'
'I am pleased to speed you on your way.'
'Perhaps a week ago? Maybe a little longer.'
'Bah! It is no matter!'
'We will turn this one aside as we have turned aside all the others!'
'Do as you like. But I am not afraid of these Orcs, or any others.'
Meet with Runerik, the village chieftain of Limlók
Examine the south-eastern fence of Limlók
Examine the eastern fence of Limlók
Examine the north-eastern fence of Limlók
Examine the north-western fence of Limlók
Examine the south-western fence of Limlók
Talk to Runerik Knotbeard outside his house in Limlók
'Might the Orcs have turned aside?'
'What happened to it?'
'Wait, Runerik.'
The raiding-party has attacked the village of Limlók from multiple directions at the same time!
'When did your people defeat this raiding-party?'
'Something must have changed recently.'

The raiding-party that threatened the safety of Limlók has been defeated, thanks to your efforts and those of your companions, as well as those of the people who dwell there. One Orc remains alive, but he will soon die of his wounds.
'Let us at least survey your defences, Runerik.'

The raiding-party that threatened the safety of Limlók has been defeated, thanks to your efforts and those of your companions, as well as those of the people who dwell there. One Orc remains alive, but he will soon die of his wounds.
'Let us check the fences, [placeholder].'
'These Orcs seem more crafty than others I have seen.'
'Perhaps I worry for nothing, and perhaps not.'
'Aye. Too many.'
'We repaired this part of the wall recently. Is there a problem?'
Talk to Venko at Limlók
'Hey, stand clear of the crops.'
Runerik believes his town has nothing to fear from the missing raiding-party, but your companions want to check Limlók's exterior fences just to make sure.
'No one will attack us from this direction, friend.'
DNT - Blah!
'Or they decided not to risk the ire of Runerik Knotbeard and his people!'
Find Venko and protect him from the Orcs
Return to Glóin in the village square and protect him from the Orcs
Listen to Glóin's words
'We will speak to the chieftain and learn what he knows of the raiding-party. For there to be no sign of it, given the dying words of Thrúgord, seems most peculiar to me.'
Talk to Natsatúg before he dies of his wounds
'These Orcs are canny, [placeholder]! They set fires along the outskirts of the village at the same time, in order to thin out the defenders.\n\n'But they did not account for us!'
'I take it you have seen no sign of this raiding-party? How surprising.'

'This attack is better-planned than I expected from the Orcs! They set fires on opposite sides of the village at the same time, forcing us to split the defences!\n\n'I hate to say it, but these Orcs may work better together than we do!'
'There have been many new folk in Limlók of late.'
'Our companions are safe? That is good to hear, my friend! Let us finish off the Orcs here and the village will follow suit!'
'It is fine. You know those were the best timbers we could find.'
'We are no strangers to fighting with Orcs. Do not worry about us!'
'My sister speaks true! Orc-slaying is our favourite hobby!'

'Enjoy... the days you have left... for they are few!'

Natsatúg coughs weakly and blood spreads from his wounds, soaking his armour.

'The time of the dwarves... is nearly ended! The Lord of Gundabad... the Lord of Gundabad...'

Natsatúg closes his eyes, and with his last exhalation he breathes a name.
'The raiding-party of which your friends spoke must have gotten lost.'
'Farewell to the worms who raided my town, and to the vermin who led them. None shall mourn.\n\n'I thank you for your aid and that of your companions, [placeholder]. It was well-given.'
Follow Runerik Knotbeard
Find Imák and protect him from the Orcs
'DWARVES!'
'Leave no dwarves alive!'
'Gorgar... the...'
'...Ruthless...'
'We have contended with Orcs from Gundabad for many years.'
'But they do not dispatch raiders this frequently.'
'He will, my husband. His wounds are grave, and he will not recover from them.'
Instance: Limlók Under Attack
Venko is ready to speak with the Beorning chieftain at the village of Limlók and learn if he has seen the missing raiding-party from Gundabad.
Venko wishes to speak with the village chieftain of Limlók to learn what befell the raiding-party from Gundabad.
DNT - Blah!
Runerik Knotbeard stands outside his home in Limlók.
Runerik does not believe his village is any more susceptible to danger than is usual for his people.
The raiding-party has attacked the village of Limlók from multiple directions at the same time!
'What is that... what is that smell?'
'Smoke! Fire and smoke!'
'Fighting in the village square!'
'I care not! This Orc must die for endangering my people!'
Natsatúg perishes as did Thrúgord: with his smiling fangs bared
The cliffs beyond the palisade here should serve as adequate defence
You hear a waterfall beyond the wall here: a natural defence?
Fight alongside Imák in defence of the village
Shorter posts were used for the encircling wall behind the barn
Fight alongside Venko in defence of the village
'Seems unlikely to me.'
'Then our errand here is finished!'
'[placeholder]! It's the raiding-party! Go and protect Imák and Venko!'
Limlók is under attack!
'We need not travel together any longer. Those are welcome tidings!'
'These Orcs carry thundercloud badges like the one you found at Framsburg!'
'Hey! These Orcs carry different badges than the one you found at Framsburg!'
'Wait! Let him live! He may be of use to us!'
'No thundercloud on this one, see? Instead there is a sword dripping blood!'
'Learn what you can from him, [placeholder]. He does not have long to live.'
'No time to puzzle it out now!'
'Go help the Longbeard and the Zhélruka, [placeholder]! I will find some water for these flames!'
Fight alongside Glóin in defence of the village
'I see nothing out of the ordinary.'
